text:
Hello Team

I am trying to applying filter in CRM Search API to filter value from a property that it contains that or not but it not working as it supposed to be.
can you please guide what wrong i am doing. Please check the screen of the filterGroup Object

Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
i need to search in tag with multiple keys

Hello Team. I would to find out if it is possible to export WhatsApp chats into an API. The end goal is to gather data gained from the responses on my WhatsApp Chatbot from customers into an API that I can then feed into another App. Is this possible?

Hi there :slightly_smiling_face: I am looking into getting all data from HubSpot with *Python* via the *API*. I am not an admin in HubSpot. I created a dev account and a test account, as well as a private app. I apparently *succeded to connect* to the API via Python but I *can't do anything after that*.

I did:
from HubSpot import HubSpot
my_token = 'pat-'
api_client = HubSpot()
api_client.access_token = my_token

But when I try to do, for example:
```api_client.crm.contacts.get_all()```
I get an error message
```MaxRetryError: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='<http://api.hubapi.com|api.hubapi.com>', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /crm/v3/objects/contacts?limit=100 (Caused by SSLError(SSLCertVerificationError(1, '[SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] certificate verify failed: unable to get local issuer certificate (_ssl.c:1129)')))```
Any idea on what I am doing wrong here? I am completly lost!

Thanks a lot! :pray:
Corentin

:wave: Hello, team!

I am working with Formcrafts as a third party form provider, and the last bit I’m trying to solve it getting the correct source attribution.
It is only attributed with either “Direct Traffic” or “Other Campaigns”
Following this article: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Pass-Original-Source-and-Original-Source-Drill-Down-1-Forms-API/m-p/314594>

Anyone have an idea how to do it correctly?
The solution from Formcrafts doesn’t entirely cut it yet: <https://formcrafts.com/help/tutorials/how-to-cookie-enable-tracking-for-HubSpot-forms>

Thanks in advance!
Any updates here? Doesn’t seem like you can listen for Tasks webhook events yet
Typo in the docs? Clicking on `link-so-some-doc` does nothing and inspecting the page reveals this is an `a` tag with no href hahaha
They are available as their<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/engagements| own objects>, but webhooks aren't supported for them at this time
Gotcha, thanks for the reply Zack :slightly_smiling_face:. Are you able to share if this is a roadmap item or otherwise being worked on?

Long term yes, but it's not something we'll be able to support this year unless things change dramatically (meaning our customers demand it more than the other things they are currently demanding from us)
Hi all, I want to automate pulling my HubSpot data into Google Spreadsheet (Preferably using Python)  for visualization in GDS. Are there any good resources anyone can point me to? Thanks.
